description: Garbage. Doesn't even start.

The Github repo is archived: "This repository has been archived by the owner. It is now read-only."
No updates, no security fixes, 60 issues still open, not acception new issues
summary: Dead project: Read only, cannot even open an issue

description: It's a good app, but it doesn't automatically switch to dark mode based on my theme, and manually toggling the dark mode setting also doesn't work.
All of a sudden this app started crashing whenever I open it. I uninstalled the Flatpak and re-installed, and then switched to the Snap package, no change at all...
summary: I liked the app, similar to Corebird, but crashes at start now

description: Adding an account works, but as soon as the feed is loaded it crashes.
favorite button appears as a ? mark
Good app minus the crashing. Would be nice to have animated GIFs for avatars
Crashes on startup on Fedora 31 after adding account.

I really liked Tootle until it started crashing every time at startup. 

I get an error about notification code not being reached for the app. I hope it can be fixed in coming versions because I really like it's minimalism and ease of use.
summary: Crashes at start after 2 months of use

description: its simple but its works very well

Its an awesome app and it works but I personally feel that is a little to simplified. What i mean is that its great for portable device like mobile or tablet like not so great for desktop. I would like if the dev would put some kind of advanced option so that you could have more of a desktop feel then mobile. But overall its a great software keep up the good work ??
It's been working great for me with no crashes or bugs. It also works on my pinephone!
summary: Cool mastodon client and adaptive to mobile devices!

description: i love Gnome and Mastodon so is perfect for me :D
Great app but need to be up to date
Crashes immediately upon logging in.
Now only shows my account for a fraction of a second. Uninstalled and went to Whalebird.

Ich habe es nicht geschafft Bilder vollständig anzeigen zu lassen (nur kleine Anreißer im Feed). Auch Abstimmungen und deren Ergebnisse wurden einfach nicht angezeigt, was mich bei manchem Toot ratlos zurückgelassen hat, was da wohl gemeint ist. Bis ich den gleichen Toot im Browser gesehen habe. Aufmachung, Design, Geschwindigkeit, alles in Ordnung, aber so trotzdem nicht brauchbar.
Einzig die Funktionen sind (noch) nicht alle vollständig abgedeckt. Aber die wichtigsten sind vorhanden und funktionieren ohne Probleme.
Se cierra cuando quiero responder, cuando quiero ver una imagen de un toot, cuando quiero ver un video.

La aplicación tiene una interfaz perfectamente acabada y mantiene toda la esencia de Gnome. Funciona perfecto en la shell y es muy cómoda para revisar la cuenta a diario. Felicitaciones y gracias por el trabajo.

L'appli fonctionnait depuis 10 jours, puis, plus foutu de la lancer.
Tant pis, Whalebird vient de la remplacer.

Bugs au lancement.
Possibilité de définir plusieurs comptes mais difficile de basculer de l'un à l'autre.
Application nécessite des améliorations.
scrolling on the pinephone pro is tricky; one time it goes well, the ext it jumpdrive you to the end

Un bon début mais à améliorer.
Utilisation compliquée pour suivre des contacts.
Quelques bugs d'affichage sur les thèmes sombres.
